aim4.UDP

Class SimulatorSerialiser

  • java.lang.Object
    • aim4.UDP.SimulatorSerialiser

  • public class SimulatorSerialiser
extends java.lang.Object
    Takes a simulator class and creates a String to send via UDP warning, only works with a single 4 way intersection
    Author:
    Alexander Humphry

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  SimulatorSerialiser.ODPair
      specifies the origin/destination pair for the player vehicle

      • SimulatorSerialiser

        public SimulatorSerialiser(AutoDriverOnlySimulator sim,
                           int port,
                           java.lang.String address,
                           SimulatorSerialiser.ODPair path)
        creates a simulator serialiser object with an instance of a simulator and a target port and network address. in addition, the path of an autonomously controlled player vehicle may be specified
        Parameters:
        sim -
        port - target network port
        address - target network address
        path -

      • SimulatorSerialiser

        public SimulatorSerialiser(AutoDriverOnlySimulator sim,
                           int port,
                           java.lang.String address,
                           SimulatorSerialiser.ODPair path,
                           double bid,
                           java.lang.String simID)
        creates a simulator serialiser object with an instance of a simulator and a target port and network address. in addition, the path of an autonomously controlled player vehicle may be specified with a bid parameter which may be used when bid or priority controlled intersection policies are in operation.
        Parameters:
        sim -
        port - target network port
        address - target network address
        path -
        bid - (usually a dollar amount or priority parameter)
        simID - (used for debug as a label describing the name of the connected simulator, may be left blank)
